dict.acceptation: 地区；区域，范围；面积，平地；领域；

sent.orig: When they were compared in different area, the results were buffer area >area >area.
sent.trans: 在不同功能区之间比较，缓冲区＞核心区＞试验区。

sent.orig: By functional division, the project contains International Area ProcessingBlock Distributing Area and Trading and Logistic Area.
sent.trans: 依据功能划分，项目分为国际区、工区、料集散区、贸物流区。

sent.orig: Implement national industry policy, break area block, optimize area structure, execute area resource to optimize configuration.
sent.trans: 贯彻国家产业政策，打破地区封锁，优化区域结构，实行区域资源优化配置。

sent.orig: Gross Area includes the Unit Covered Area the apportioned share of common area the unit.
sent.trans: 建筑面积包括单位有盖面积名单位所分摊的公用地方面积。

sent.orig: This area divides into the resting entertainment area, the central watching area active region.
sent.trans: 该区又划分为休憩娱乐区、中心观赏区、活动区。
